All Classes and Interfaces

Classes
Class
Description
ControllerWindow
The GUI for the game controller it is used to control the player in the game
DataModel
This class is used to store the data of the game. and to update the observers whenever the data changes.
Floor
This class is used to define the Floor object, inherits from GameObject.java with id = ' ' and icon = blank.png
GameMap
Thi GameMap is an interface between the GameObjects and the DataModel.
GameObject
 
Goal
The Red circle that the boxes must come to or occur This class is used to define the Goal object, inherits from GameObject.java with id = 'g' and icon = blankmarked.png
GraphPresenter
This class is used to display current map of the game in a graphical way.
Level
show the level of the player or create a level map
LevelDisplay
 
MovingBox
This class is used to define the MovingBox object, inherits from GameObject.java with id = 'o' and icon = crate.png
Player
The Player object that the user controls. this class is used to define the Player object, inherits from GameObject.java with two ids {p: player, x: player standing on goal} and icon = player.png
Sokobon
The starting point of the Game Sokobon
